data.title: UniCredit Group
data.text:
Croatia

The largest bank in Croatia

Leveraging on the strength and network of UniCredit GSS and being at the forefront of all new market developments and changes, Zagrebacka banka stands out as the pioneer in providing custody services in Croatia with a market share of approximately 40% (with regards to both international and domestic clients).

As the local leader in offering securities services, including fund administration, we combine the longest track record in the market (being the first bank to offer custody in 1995) with the best market expertise and the strongest lobbying power through our excellent relationships with all market participants.

The GSS team of Zagrebacka banka, comprising long-experienced and highly-skilled staff perfectly trained to service international clients, takes great pride in the high-quality services it provides complemented by individualised attention to all client needs.
